message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I know you'll find valuable. Considering its potential worth to someone like you, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,350,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but I believe the value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,275,000.  This is my final offer.

I understand that you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still not convinced that $1,275,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,225,000. That's the highest I'm willing to pay.
